name: Gameplan
description: Enter the Gameplan ecosystem with the $GPLAN Token, your gateway to a new era of fan engagement in sports. This token is not just a currency; it's a part of the innovative Web3 sports platform that utilizes layer 2 solutions for enhanced scalability and efficiency. Fans can accumulate rewards through gaming, interact with real-world assets (RWA) and connect with their favourite athlete through immersive gamified experiences. Use $GPLAN to impact team decisions, access unique digital and real-world merchandise, and enhance your interaction with a network of 70+ athletes including UFC Hall of Fame legend Khabib Nurmagomedov. Be more than a fanâ€”be a participant in your favorite teams and experience the full spectrum of sports entertainment.
